channel.title: Fatal Error
channel.description:
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -105 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:13428) at client.packetProcess(client.java:12463) at client.process(client.java:12433) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:48) Mdw Server [fatal] - exception[/code]
here is what I get when I try to click trade on an NPC and it disconnects me :$
any help?

item.title: Fatal Error
item.dc:creator: @Phoenixx Phoenixx
item.description:
@Phoenixx wrote:

Nevermind I got it to work.

Thanks for trying to help though

Read full topic

Change them to where they were before and post what happens.

item.title: Fatal Error
item.dc:creator: @Phoenixx Phoenixx
item.description:
@Phoenixx wrote:

Hmm… the problem isn’t messed up in case 17:

I just looked in case 17: and nothing was changed from before.

This happend right after I moved my NPC’s from one location to another…
so how could I fix the problem?

I know it’s a problem with this because I didn’t move one of the NPC’s and that second click works…

Read full topic

item.title: Fatal Error
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

o0 v 1 n o0:

Did you, by chance, try to add a Silabsoft client item into a shop without your server being compatible with it?

That’s not the problem.

The error is at PacketProcess, where the packets 17 and 155 are located, and if you didn’t know, they are second click(right click) and click NPC.

You used 17, for sure, because people don’t do it properly. Anyways you fucked up something there.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Phoenixx wrote:

Nope, I use my own client.
